fmiModelDescription.description: Implementation of Enulescu et al. PLOS Comput. Biol. 2017 Fe metabolism model: new version

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_mRNA
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA ammount in other organs (s11)

ScalarVariable.name: der(Fpn_res_mRNA)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Fpn mRNA ammount in other organs (s11))

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_RBC
ScalarVariable.description: Fe ammount in red blood cells (s6)

ScalarVariable.name: der(Fe_RBC)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Fe ammount in red blood cells (s6))

ScalarVariable.name: v_Bmp6_max
ScalarVariable.description: Bmp6 maximal synthesis rate (k21*k37 = k21*K_Bmp6) k21 = 1.6015, K_Bmp6 = 19.65, 14.2/126.5

ScalarVariable.name: Tf
ScalarVariable.description: Paremeter determining the maximal amount of iron that can be bound to transferrin (k32)

ScalarVariable.name: v_spl_1
ScalarVariable.description: Spleen iron uptake rate from RBC (k10), 0.002 = value for trace exp., 0.004/0.005

ScalarVariable.name: v_spl_2
ScalarVariable.description: Spleen iron uptake rate from bones (k7), 0.008/0.019

ScalarVariable.name: K_duo
ScalarVariable.description: Saturation parameter duodenal uptake, corresponds to k11, units??

ScalarVariable.name: v_duo_max
ScalarVariable.description: Maximal duodenal uptake from food (SI. Eq.14)

ScalarVariable.name: malabsorption
ScalarVariable.description: iron malabsorption coefficient: <0;1>; 0 = no absorption, 1 = physiologic

ScalarVariable.name: loss_factor
ScalarVariable.description: iron loss factor, 1 = physiologic, >1 enhanced loss

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_duo_3
ScalarVariable.description: Fe+++ in duodenum, basically in ferritin

ScalarVariable.name: der(Fe_duo_3)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Fe+++ in duodenum, basically in ferritin)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_duo_in_food
ScalarVariable.description: Fe input to duodenum from intestines, prev:in_1

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_duo_in_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe input to duodenum from serum, prev:in_2

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_duo_out_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe output from duodenum to serum, prev:out_1

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_duo_out_loss
ScalarVariable.description: Fe output from duodenum to intestines (Fe loss), prev:out_2

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_duo_in_1
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in duodenum creation: standard from mRNA

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_duo_in_2
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in duodenum creation by activation of Fe_duo

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_duo_out_1
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in duodenum: standard degradation rate

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_duo_out_2
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in duodenum by hepcidine

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_duo_mRNA_inhib
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in duodenum production inhibition by IL-6 (or indirectly by LPS)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_liv_3
ScalarVariable.description: Fe+++ in liver, basically in ferritin

ScalarVariable.name: der(Fe_liv_3)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Fe+++ in liver, basically in ferritin)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_liv_in_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe input to liver from serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_liv_out_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe output from liver to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_liv_in_1
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in liver creation: standard from mRNA

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_liv_in_2
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in liver creation by activation of Fe_liv

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_liv_out_1
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in liver: standard degradation rate

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_liv_out_2
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in liver by hepcidine

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_liv_mRNA_inhib
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in liver production inhibition by IL-6 (or indirectly by LPS)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_in_liv
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from liver to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_in_spl
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from spleen to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_in_duo
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from duodenum to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_in_res
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from other organs to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_out_liv
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from serum to liver

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_out_bm
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from serum to bone marrow

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_out_duo
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from serum to duodenum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_ser_out_res
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from serum to other organs

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_spl_in_RBC
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow to spleen from RBC

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_spl_in_bm
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow to spleen from bone marrow

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_spl_out_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from spleen to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_spl_in_1
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in spleen creation: standard from mRNA

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_spl_in_2
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in spleen creation by activation of Fe_spl

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_spl_out_1
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in spleen: standard degradation rate

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_spl_out_2
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in spleen by hepcidine

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_spl_mRNA_inhib
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in spleen production inhibition by IL-6 (or indirectly by LPS)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_res_in_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow to other organs from serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_res_out_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from other organs to serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_res_out_loss
ScalarVariable.description: Fe loss from other organs (skin peeling, etc.)

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_in_1
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in other organs creation: standard from mRNA

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_in_2
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn in other organs creation by activation of Fe_res

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_out_1
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in other organs: standard degradation rate

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_out_2
ScalarVariable.description: Degradation (internalization) of Fpn in other organs by hepcidine

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_mRNA_in
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in other organs synthesis

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_mRNA_out
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in other organs degradation

ScalarVariable.name: Fpn_res_mRNA_inhib
ScalarVariable.description: Fpn mRNA in other organs production inhibition by IL-6 (or indirectly by LPS)

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_bm_in_ser
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow to bone marrow from serum

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_bm_out_RBC
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from bone marrow to RBC

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_bm_out_spl
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from bone marrow to spleen

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_RBC_in_bm
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow to RBC from bone marrow

ScalarVariable.name: Fe_RBC_out_spl
ScalarVariable.description: Fe flow from RBC to spleen
